name: Starpop Showdown
description:
Do not fullscreen this game.

Star is a young girl from Toronto who, after her time at a boring private school, aspires to become a famous popstar. However, she quickly finds that she has to compete with other established stars of their own domain. Can she outshine her rivals? 

Starpop Showdown is a single-player rhythm game that includes cutscenes and increasingly difficult gameplay. 

Controls: ASDF to play

So far, only the tutorial has been created. It is unknown whether the remaining three levels will ever be playable, but please enjoy!

All music by Tsundere Twintails !!

(Used with permission)
